::: {#about}
### Welcome !

I am a PhD student in Economics at the European University Institute (EUI) in Florence, Italy.

I work under the supervision of [Thomas Crossley](https://sites.google.com/site/tfcrossley/) and [Alessandro Tarozzi](https://sites.google.com/site/alessandrotarozzi/home).

My main research interests are applied microeconomics and causal inference, with a particular focus on family economics, spatial economics and labor economics.
:::
